"EyeSight" - A virtual reality headset that creates a simulated visual environment for the visually impaired, allowing them to see and interact with the world around them.
"BrailleMate" - A smartphone app that converts text and images into braille, making it easier for the visually impaired to read and understand digital content.
"VoiceSight" - A smart glasses that uses facial recognition and voice recognition technology to help the visually impaired navigate their surroundings and interact with objects.
"TouchSight" - A tactile display device that allows the visually impaired to see and interact with digital content using touch and haptic feedback.
"SoundSight" - A smartphone app that uses sound waves to create a virtual image in the air, allowing the visually impaired to see and interact with digital content.
